alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 3:58AM CDT until March 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW AND WIND EXPECTED TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY NIGHT... .Low pressure tracking through the western Great Lakes will bring periods of snow to northern Wisconsin tonight through Friday night, with significant accumulations expected over Vilas County. Northwest winds will gust to 30 to 35 mph late tonight into Friday, resulting in patchy blowing and drifting snow in open areas. Hazardous travel conditions are anticipated. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Total snow accumulations through Friday night of 4 to 6 inches over southeast Vilas County, and 6 to 10 inches over the northwest part of the county. Winds gusting as high 30 to 35 mph late tonight into Friday, resulting in patchy blowing and drifting snow in open areas. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
